data.text: @SianVidak @CO_AFC Our son went the opposite way Yorkshire to Devon to CTCRM. Had a few setbacks but stills in training. Good luck to your son.
@daviesj940 @CO_AFC Always such a pivotal moment in life, when they go and capture their own future.

@mercer_felicity @CO_AFC He's my biggest pride and worst nightmare all rolled into one, you must feel like that with Johnny 🤣
Only wants me to take in his parcels, and has his 5-year-old brother do his laundry for him. So living his best life really.
@SianVidak @CO_AFC We did the same with ours a year ago, he’s loving life !

@DCrook70 @CO_AFC He left our house as a shy lad, and returned this confident young man. He's great company and I love seeing his personal growth as he captures his future. He couldn't of got that in "normal life" in the same way.

@SianVidak @CO_AFC An amazing journey…..and I’m sure it’s just the start! It’s amazing what a crucible moment it can be - that moment of being dropped off, and then that moment of ‘Passing Out’: values and qualities intensified by the experience. Great work all round. 👏👏👏👏
@SianVidak @CO_AFC that's great sian he has a great heart 😆❤️👏👏👍
